name: The Final Flower
description:
Story

You are one of many gods during the apocalypse. Save the flower from extinction by aiming your shield.

More Infos during the game.

Gameplay

Move your mouse to aim your shield and protect the flower. You will encounter:

  • Fire: Damages you growth (health)
  • Ice: Slows down your shield
  • Rain: Refills yours water (let some rain touch your flower, but not too much)
  • Lightning: Like fire, but you have to click once it touches the shield
Content
  • ~6 Minutes of gameplay
  • A full day-night cycle
  • 4 different hazards to challenge your skills
  • 2 varied songs to accompany you (Menu and In-Game)
Controls

Everything is controlled with the mouse and the left mouse button

Spring 2D Jam

This game was created for the Spring 2D Jam hosted by TheoClarke. The theme for the jam was Growth. The time limit was 48 hours. This is a solo entry.

Note

My PC decided today was a good day to start overheating and crashing a bunch, so I wasn't able to implement everything I had planned (mainly some more visuals to represent the flower actually growing and some more variation in the finale). I still think the game came out alright. Solo game development is hard
